recipesJson.name: Black Currant Ice cream
recipesJson.author: ruinate
recipesJson.description: Keep the Milky Undertone or not. This is some good stuff! Super simple and oh, so delicious!

reviews.text: This is ice cold I usually never use ws-23 above 0.5%, but I mixed this with it at 1% first vapes where super super cold, but then my throat got used to it, and it really helps sell it as an ice cream. The black currant comes through well with the help out the lemon you added. Your ice cream base is very good the milky cream and TPA VBIC blend together perfectly. I am not fan of really sweet juices so i only used 0.25% super sweet and its plenty sweet enough for me. Great job glad I stumbled upon this tasty recipe
Solid winner. Cool, bright, and fruity. My first try with Blackcurrant. It was good as SNV, but really seemed to bloom at around 5 days. If you can, wait. But ADV and 5 full stars. Well done ruinate

My first mix using WS-23 and, I must say, I'm glad I found 'this' recipe. I haven't seen Black Currant pushed this high,this successfully...Ever. I am at 24hrs. post mix and can only imagine what some more time will do for it. No 'off' notes and the extra SS really compliments the Black Currant . Cooling took a while to get used to,but, won't change a thing when I mix a big bottle tom. Thanks so much!
This is great, but I might ditch the WS-23.
Love it.  First few days I mostly get ice cold black currant, but the ice cream creeps in after a week or so and makes it extra delicious.  Thanks!

Absolutely delish!  Black currant is one of my favorite fruit flavors, so I was excited to try this.  I was not disappointed!  I may add a bit of flv Cream, or some Fresh Cream as @amouthforwar mentioned, just to thicken it up since I as well do not have OOO CMU.  Thanks and well done!

I don't have OOO CMU, so i used a touch of FA Fresh Cream as it's the closest milky, plain cream I've got. This is a great mix with a very unique flavor to it. Nice and tart berry blended with a tried and true VBIC. Ice cold, just how I like it. I've not yet vaped anything where blackcurrant was the main note so this threw me for a bit of a loop but it is delicious and I'm craving more!
